title: Color Changing Galaxy Cocktail
directions: To Make Blue Butterfly Pea Flower Simple Syrup:
Brew 1 cup of Blue Butterfly Pea Flower Tea with 3 tablespoons food-grade, edible Blue Butterfly Pea Flowers, and boiling water.
Build the cocktail up with your chilled glass filled with ice cubes. Add the simple syrup, then the vodka, and then finish with the club soda.
Sprinkle pomegranate seeds, place the rosemary sprig and straws for serving. Drizzle honey over the top and sprinkle sparkling sugar.
When you want to change the color from blue to purple-pink, add a squeeze of lemon or lime juice (or both) and stir. Enjoy!

Home Chef Tip: 1) Use a honey dipper to get a perfect drizzle. 2) Chill the glass in the freezer for 5-10 minutes before making the cocktail which helps keep the recipe cold. 3) You can store any remaining simple syrup in the refrigerator in an air-tight container for up to two weeks.
ingredients: 3 tbsp food-grade, edible Blue Butterfly Pea Flowers
2-3 tbsp Blue Butterfly Pea Flower Simple Syrup, amount to taste
Splash of club soda or seltzer water, amount to taste
Lemon and lime wedges for squeezing
Sparkling sugar (or any coarse raw sugar)
